Posts.Title: Head Rash - Side Effect ?? CjPA Rista

Posts.Content: CjPA wrote: I have this itchy, red rash mostly at the back of my head but it seems to be spreading.  Any time I wear a hat or scarf the itching increases.  Talked to doctor and they recommended I not cover my head and keep it to the air, benedryl for itching and OTC cortizone cream. I've just finished my second chemo 2 weeks ago- Taxotere and Cyton.  Anyone else having problems?  I'm going crazy here!!!! Dx 5/13/2009, LCIS, 5cm, Stage II, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 8/15/2009 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy 12/20/2009 Breast, Lymph nodes Hormonal Therapy 2/15/2010 Femara (letrozole) Log in to post a reply
